quest.name: A Matter of Course
journal:
Mayaru Moyaru looks eager to regale you about all there is to know of the latest Moonfire Faire.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

Noticing the sweat on your brow from the summer heat, Mayaru Moyaru motions you to visit Costa del Sol so you can cool down by taking a dip in its serene waters. He implores you to enjoy the Moonfire Faire festivities while you are there, and mentions the return of a mysterious attraction. To learn more, it seems you must speak with his colleague, Haermaga, in the seaside resort.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

Haermaga quickly reveals to you that the mysterious returning attraction is none other than the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course─albeit reborn. He mentions that he has a request he wishes to make of you, if you are willing to help. Speak with him again to accept his request.

Haermaga's request concerns R'fhul Tia, whom he feels has let his early success get to his head. He wants you to act as a guiding star for the young adventurer, and set him back upon the right path. To do so, you will first need to speak with R'fhul Tia.

Both of R'fhul Tia's apprentices introduce themselves to you at his behest. Though he seems quite confident he will succeed in his attempt through the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course, you notice that the two of them and R'majha are worried about him. Proceed to the destination to watch how he performs.
R'fhul Tia's attempt ended in failure. After such a fall, he is in dire need of help. Render him aid with all haste.

R'fhul Tia's apprentices do not mince words in expressing their disappointment with him, and shortly thereafter take their leave. He cannot seem to understand what he did wrong, but fortunately for him, he still has you.
objectives: Speak with Haermaga in Costa del Sol.

dialogue.name: MAYARUMOYARU
dialogue.text: Ah, hello, hello! Just the adventurer I was looking for. Feeling the heat? Well, nothing like a good swim in Costa del Sol to cool down─and while you're there, you might as well enjoy the Moonfire festivities!

dialogue.name: MAYARUMOYARU
dialogue.text: Hello there! You look to me like an adventurer who can enjoy a good festival when they see one. And if I may say so myself, the Moonfire Faire is the finest of them in all of Eorzea!

dialogue.name: MAYARUMOYARU
dialogue.text: The faire has served to promote the Adventurers' Guild in recent years, and I expect plenty of folks'll join the fun this summer─no one will want to miss the exciting show we're putting on.

dialogue.name: MAYARUMOYARU
dialogue.text: That's right─due to popular demand and the wishes of Master Gegeruju himself, we brought back the challenge!

dialogue.name: MAYARUMOYARU
dialogue.text: Intrigued, aren't you? Sate your curiosity by speaking with Haermaga in Costa del Sol!

dialogue.name: MAYARUMOYARU
dialogue.text: Look for Haermaga on the Isle of Endless Summer at Costa del Sol. He can tell you everything you need to know!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename, here at last! You're here to give the challenge a whirl, aren't you? That hulking monstrosity erected upon the shore...

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Welcome to the Moonfire Faire, fair adventurer! You're here to give the challenge a whirl, aren't you? That hulking monstrosity erected upon the shore...

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: The imposing fortress that turns grown men into weeping babes, the crucible which forges the fiercest of warriors or spits out their mangled remains─aye, the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: We've had some issues here and there which prevented us from constructing the course anew for a time, but we made it work this year to satisfy the fierce demand from our patrons.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: It hasn't merely returned, however─oh no, it's been updated and refined with a new circuit. I daresay it's a course...reborn!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: While the new circuit isn't physically demanding, it's no less a spectacle. We recruited the finest Gold Saucer technicians and a certain bomb expert to craft so many bombs into the new attraction, it feels like a damned volcano's erupting when they go off!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Aye, 'tis a trial that tests the resolve of fledgling and experienced adventurers alike, as all are forced to not only calculate the timing of the impending explosions, but avoid the shockwaves that follow them too. If you think you're up to the task, then by all means, show everyone how it's done!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Heh, you look eager to try your hand at it despite all the risks. And yet I don't get the sense that you're underestimating the challenge before you either... <sigh> It would do the young lad good to see the temperament of a veteran like yourself. Would that he could learn from your example...

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Ah, it's nothing─just, this talk about the course in all its newfound glory brought to mind a certain worrisome adventurer.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Look, you wouldn't mind lending me a hand with something, would you? When you're not busy running the course, naturally. Give me a shout after this if you're interested.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: You'll lend a hand then? You have my gratitude. The matter in question is in regards to a certain new...ah, I suppose he isn't new anymore. Well, anyway, I want you to act as a model of sorts for a certain young adventurer.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: He's no stranger to you of course─recall a fellow by the name of R'fhul Tia? Came to the Moonfire Faire with his little sister R'mahja before, remember? The lad went and became an adventurer, and seems to have some experience under his belt now, but...

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: The lad's name is R'fhul Tia. Comes to the Moonfire Faire regularly with his little sister R'mahja, and seems to be a well-meaning fellow for the most part. Recently, though...

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Well, to be frank, he's putting on airs. You'd better see him for yourself to get the real picture. I saw him heading to the north of the island with his sister earlier─you should be able to find him there.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: While he has his issues, there's no doubt in my mind that he has a promising future as an adventurer. I'll leave it up to you to decide how you want to go about it, but guide him back onto the right path, would you?

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: R'fhul Tia should be somewhere on the north side of the island. How you go about it is up to you─just guide him back onto the right path.

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: I begged my brother to bring me again this year, I just love it sooo much! And it's even more fun because he's with me!

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERA04540
dialogue.text: W-Wait a minute, you're...I can't believe this, you're like one of my heroes!

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERB04540
dialogue.text: Well, this is a pleasant surprise. Our mentor predicted you would join the festivities.

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Long time no see, Forename! I had a feeling we'd meet again. Don't be shy now, Majha!

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Hello, Forename! I'm so happy you're here. Today just keeps getting better and better!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Ah, might you be Forename? It's an honor to finally meet you! O-Oh, and this right here is my little sister!

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Pleased to meet you, MissMister Adventurer! My name is R'majha! Will you be playing with us today?

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Since you're here, there's something I want to tell you... Though I've only been an adventurer for a few summers, I've already made a name for myself. Hells, I even have a pair of apprentices!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: I suppose you'd expect as much for someone of my obvious talent, eh?

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Anyway, where was I? Oh, right─my apprentices. Go on, introduce yourselves!

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERA04540
dialogue.text: Hello there, friend! The pair of us are just your average friendly ol' novice adventurers who wound up taking up an apprenticeship under our mentor here after he saved us from a sticky situation─he's a big fan of yours, by the way!

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERA04540
dialogue.text: The mentor we respect respects you, so if you really think about it, we ought to respect you too! And anyone who commands that much respect is clearly incredible. It's an honor, misssir─truly!

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERB04540
dialogue.text: I've heard all kinds of amazing rumors about you, Forename. It's a pleasure to finally make your acquaintance.

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: So, I take it you also heard about the challenge and decided to join in the festivities?

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: I won't lie, I'm itching to give the course a go myself! I hear they've even added a new bombastic circuit to it. Though, for a prodigy like me who completed it as a novice...

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: The real challenge'll be not to fall asleep from boredom. Heh, a rising star like me has nowhere to go but up, after all!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Good luck.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You could try, you know, not being cocky as well?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: ...You've completed the course before?

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Heh, I appreciate the sentiment, but I'll be fine. It'll be easy enough to dazzle the audience.

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Still, it's an honor to be encouraged by the person I look up to─thank you!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Nonsense, I'm being confident, not cocky! It just comes naturally to me─I guess this is what happens when you become a respectable adventurer, eh?

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Watch me out there, Forename. When I tear through that course, you'll understand what I'm capable of!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Wh-What are you saying, Forename! And in front of my impressionable apprentices no less! You should be well aware of my historic achievement!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Make no mistake, I've completed the course. The old me who made one blunder after another is gone. You'll see, just watch!

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Are you sure you're okay, Fhul? You've been acting odd lately...

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Am I okay? Hah! I'm better than ever. Don't you worry one bit, Mahjaーyour big brother's a fully fledged adventurer now. I'll give the crowd a show and be back before you know it.

dialogue.name: FHULTIA
dialogue.text: From the moment I became an adventurer, I've always looked up to you. There's no one I want witnessing my finest achievement more than you, so if you can spare a moment to watch, please wait for me on the beach.

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Fhul...

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERA04540
dialogue.text: It'll be okay, Majha. It's your brother after all. He'll pull through, surely...

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERB04540
dialogue.text: Yes, I'm sure you have nothing to worry about, my dear...

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: You'll come too, won't you? I'll feel better if you're there!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Damn you, Beaudefoin...

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: ...Eh? Ah, it's nothing. Don't concern yourself with my problems. R'fhul needs all the help he can get.

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Fhul... I really hope he'll be okay.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERA04540
dialogue.text: It wasn't so long ago─the day R'fhul rescued us, I mean. We didn't know left from right, but still thought we had the chops to take on a rampaging beast. We'd have died had R'fhul, who happened to be passing by, not put his life on the line for us.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERA04540
dialogue.text: Thinking back on it, the way he fought was downright clumsy─even to my eyes. But I will never forget how desperately he fought to save us... He showed us what it truly means to be an adventurer.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERA04540
dialogue.text: That's why we decided to follow him. I know he'll do his best out there today, because that's the kind of man he is!

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERB04540
dialogue.text: Recently, R'fhul's been... Sorry. Forget I said anything.

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Do you see my brother? I can't see anything from here...

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: (-???-)Aha, I sense a damsel in distress! Fear not, young maiden, for we are here to the rescue!

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: (-Beaudefoin-)Ahem... Let the games begin! I, Beaudefoin, will humbly serve as herald of the proceedings.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: (-Haermaga-)<sigh> ...And I, Haermaga, have been unjustly nominated to assist him.

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: (-Beaudefoin-)Together, not even the slightest happening shall escape our ardent observation!

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: (-Beaudefoin-)Now then, let us look upon our contestant, the up-and-coming adventurer R'fhul Tia! With such a daunting trial before him, who knows what could be running through his mind right now. What do those stern blue eyes of yours see, Haermaga?

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: (-Haermaga-)The lad looks eager to get up and at it, and in terms of physique, he looks to be in fine shape. That said, I can't help but notice some nervous energy in him as well.

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: (-Beaudefoin-)Thank you, Haermaga. Let's wish him the best of luck out─ Ah! The contestant has just took off at a run, and is presently making his way to the first jet of water!

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: (-Beaudefoin-)And he soars through the sky expertly! Wow, just look at that landing!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: (-Haermaga-)A splendid feat indeed. He managed it all without losing his footing. This is proof of his experience as an adventurer─he's well accustomed to moving under pressure─or above it, as it were.

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: (-Beaudefoin-)And now, he is faced with a decision that will change the course of his fate. Does he take the tried-and-true path, or try his luck at the new circuit...

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: (-Beaudefoin-)Which route do you think our sprightly contender will take, Haermaga?

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: (-Haermaga-)The new circuit requires a contestant to be calm and collected in the face of a looming barrage of bombs. Unfortunately, I sense much fear in this one. If I were in his shoes, I would pick the old circuit without a second thought...

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: (-Beaudefoin-)Ah, he's on the move! It seems he's made his decision: the new circuit! The timing of his movements leave much to be desired, however...

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: (-Haermaga-)Even the slightest moment's hesitation could lead to a messy result, and I fear he teetered for too long... Cover your eyes folks, this could get ugly.

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: (-Beaudefoin-)He managed to dodge the first explosion! And the second, the third, and the─

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: (-Beaudefoin-)Gods be good, the shockwave of the fourth explosion has sent him flying like a shooting star!

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: (-Beaudefoin-)Ladies and gentlemen, even as the seawater salts his wounds, I regret to inform you that our contestant has been disqualified!

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: No, no, no, this is bad! This is really, really bad!

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: (-Beaudefoin-)Well, there goes our audience. This seems as fine a place as any to end the commentary. Please, go. R'fhul needs your help.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: (-Haermaga-)Right. I hope you haven't forgotten my request. I'm counting on you.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Blast that Beaudefoin, the wily little bastard. I told him hundreds of times I'm not interested in this nonsense, but he still managed to get his way in the end... Er, mind if I ask what you thought of my─you know what, never mind. I don't want to know...

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: I leave the matter of R'fhul Tia's rescue in your capable hands!

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Fhul! Are you hurt?

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERA04540
dialogue.text: Not like this, R'fhul...not like this.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERB04540
dialogue.text: I had my suspicions, but I hoped they wouldn't prove to be true...

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: I-I owe you one, Forename...

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Ah, lest you all misunderstand, that wasn't a serious attempt. If I really wanted to complete the course, I could've done it with my hands behind my back!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: But it'd hardly be entertaining if I just finished it in an instant. There's no drama. Now, when I go back and complete it with ease, the crowd'll go wild! Genius, eh?

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERA04540
dialogue.text: Wait a minute, R'fhul... Is that what you really care about? If so, you're not the person I thought you were─the person I respected.

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Oh, uh, erm, I mean... I'm not just your average adventurer, you know? I need to amaze everyone!

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERB04540
dialogue.text: No, R'fhul... You're wrong. I guess you never understood what we admired about you. I'm sorry...but this is farewell.

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Wh-What... What did I do wrong!?
